General.Name: Loncin Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Loncin Motor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells generating sets, agricultural machinery equipment, light-duty power units, and two-wheeled motorcycles in Japan and internationally. It offers motorcycles, motorcycle engines, recreational vehicles, engines, farm machinery; and engine parts. The company also provides large displacement engines; generators, water pumps, battery lawns, and tillers, as well as maintenance services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Chongqing, China. Loncin Motor Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Loncin Holdings Limited.
